[faastjs](./faastjs.md) &gt; [PersistentCache](./faastjs.persistentcache.md) &gt; [(constructor)](./faastjs.persistentcache._constructor_.md)

## PersistentCache.(constructor)

Construct a new persistent cache, typically used with [Limits](./faastjs.limits.md) as part of the arguments to [throttle()](./faastjs.throttle.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(
    dirRelativeToHomeDir: string, 
    expiration?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dirRelativeToHomeDir | string | The directory under the user's home directory that will be used to store cached values. The directory will be created if it doesn't exist. |
|  expiration | number | The age (in ms) after which a cached entry is invalid. Default: <code>24*3600*1000</code> (1 day). |
